alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 4:02AM EST until January 12 at 4:30AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Warrick County in southwestern Indiana... Northeastern Vanderburgh County in southwestern Indiana... Southeastern Gibson County in southwestern Indiana... Pike County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 330 AM CST/430 AM EST/. * At 302 AM CST/402 AM EST/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Melody Hill, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lynnville around 320 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Oakland City and Winslow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 6 and 46. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 26 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
